name: LupusLoyaltyConversation
_source: s;Lupus;Simon! I'm glad you stopped by.
s;Lupus;A moneymaking opportunity.{w}{br}You're gonna like it.
s;Lupus;So Pelopos, right. Great little republic run by a bunch of creepy old senators.
s;Lupus;One of them, Senator Gesman, is hosting a grand ball for esteemed guests.
s;Lupus;Woah, Anuki! H-hey, what's up! Doing well? That's great.
s;Anuki;Keep talking, I'm interested in your plan.
s;Lupus;I-I-I was just thinking, we need money, right?
s;Lupus;This senator's got a vault, magically protected,{w}{br}all that, basically filled with gold.
s;Lupus;You don't have to come! Like, you really don't have to.{w}{br}Don't even worry about it.
s;Anuki;You're not getting away that easily.
s;Simon;I have a few questions about this plan.
s;Simon;Why would a Pelopos senator invite a duke to his ball?
s;Lupus;Look, guys like this don't let things like politics distract them.{w}{br}They wanna be important, and your presence gives them that.
s;Simon;You sound as if you know him.
s;Lupus;Eh, not exactly. My sister used to do some work for him.
s;Simon;Should we expect to run into her?
s;Lupus;No. She, uh, died a few years back.
s;Anuki;This is a ploy for you to get revenge.
s;Lupus;Something like that. I'm not planning on killing the guy.
s;Anuki;And how much do Simon and I actually have to gain?
s;Lupus;I told you, the Peloponnesian senators are loaded.{w}{br}I have my own grudge, but this is worth your time.
s;Simon;I believe you. What preparations do we need?
s;Lupus;Leave that to me. I'll arrange the formal wear.
s;Lupus;You two won't regret this. Seriously.
s;Simon;I find him hard to dislike, to be honest.
s;Anuki;Then you haven't met enough people like him.{w}{br}He'll split the moment he's given the chance- just watch.
